title: Were Is Twisted Fate Atm
body: I wasn't online when tf got disabled so I don't know what the glitch was or anything and when do you think he will come back? I was about to play him then I saw in champ select that he wasn't available so I ended up just picking Lucian, it worked and I won but still I wanted tf. hes been  away fro what has seemed to be years ;-;.

replies.body:
Twisted Fate was disabled due to a bug that happened when interacting with a specific item. We deployed a hotfix last night that addressed this and you shouldn't have any issues using him now that he's been enabled again.

Let me know if you have any questions.
It was one of those "how the hell did that interaction come up" bugs indeed. That one TF support had to be in Heaven for that game though.
I feel you.. He's my main mid champion.. I got his underworld skin
